entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
